{{also|Gefallen}} ==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ɡəˈfaln̩/|/ɡəˈfalən/}} * {{audio|de|De-gefallen.ogg|audio}} ===Etymology 1=== From {{der|de|gmh|gevallen}}, from {{der|de|goh|gifallan}}{{R:Duden|gefallen_reizen_begeistern}}. Equivalent to {{prefix|de|ge|fallen}} ====Verb==== {{de-verb-strong|class=7|gefällt|gefiel|gefallen|past subjunctive=gefiele}} # {{lb|de|intransitive|with dative}} to [[please]]; to [[appeal]] [[to]] #: ''Diese Hose '''gefällt''' mir.'' #:: ''I like these trousers.'' =====Conjugation===== {{de-conj-strong|gefall|gefiel|gefallen|h||gefäll||a|||a}} ===Etymology 2=== ====Verb==== {{head|de|past participle}} # {{past participle of|de|fallen|nocat=1}} # {{past participle of|de|gefallen|nocat=1}} ====Adjective==== {{de-adj|-}} # [[fallen]], [[dropped]] =====Declension===== {{de-decl-adj-notcomp|gefallen}} ===References=== ---- ==West Frisian== ===Noun=== {{head|fy|noun form}} # {{plural of|fy|gefal}}
